Steps to Reproduce: 

   It seems the error has something to do with the environment setup so the easy way to reproduce it will be importing the db from bvrgsa defects folder
  
Actual Results: 

   Displaying Computers:L2 view failed

Expected Results:  

   Computers:L2 view will display successfully

Build Date & Platform: 

   Aperi-20061206-221255.zip on windows platform

The problem is in the query declared in SELECT_LUN_FROM_HOST from 
org.eclipse.aperi.server.guireq.topology.views.ViewerServerL2.

In this query,"RTRIM(CAST(DATA_PATH.DEVICE_LUN_ID as CHAR(3))) PATH," should
be changed to  "RTRIM(CAST(DATA_PATH.DEVICE_LUN_ID as CHAR(10))) PATH,"

Solved as described in Comment #1
The fix was checked in Eclipse CVS on December 15.
